opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order, 284 Pa.Super. 1, 424 A.2d 1360, Affirmed. See Schreiber v. Pennsylvania Lumberman’s Mutual Insurance Co., 498 Pa. 21, 444 A.2d 647 (1982).
NIX, J., files a concurring opinion.
KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

opinions.text:
NIX, Justice,
concurring.
The record in this case does not present a situation warranting equitable intervention; see, e.g., Schreiber v. Pennsylvania Lumberman’s Mutual Insurance Company, 498 Pa. 21, 26, 444 A.2d 647, 649 (1982) (Nix, J. dissenting). Therefore I concur in the result.
